com.geom.MVCModel

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.geom.MVCModel.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.util.Observable
    Implements the Model of the UI i.e
    • Model of the Board
    • Model of the Search Window
    Author:
    Dasha
